definition: to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: In writing telegrams, omit superfluous words .
sentences.chinese: 寫電報稿要省去不必要的字。

sentences.english: Since you don' t use any utensils to eat, you can use this bread to scoop up the curry or rice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用麪包來盛咖喱粉和米飯而省去了器皿。
充分陳述的案件能省去一半的審問。

sentences.english: Omit the questionable passage and draw back from the edge.
sentences.chinese: 省去可疑的段落，從剽竊的邊緣上抽身而退。

sentences.english: This finishing operation is omitted on bodies receiving rubber diaphragms.
sentences.chinese: 這道修整工序省去了配置橡膠隔膜的閥體。

sentences.english: There is no need for solid solution and overaging pretreatments in the superplastic deformation process.
sentences.chinese: 可省去固溶與過時效預處理工序。

sentences.english: Having a one-button deployment saves you a lot of headaches.
sentences.chinese: 擁有一鍵式部署將爲您省去很多令人頭痛之事。

sentences.english: Direct driving by hollow shaft expels chains and saves time for lubrication and tension adjustment on chains.
sentences.chinese: 直接由空心驅動軸驅動，省去了鏈條潤滑等維護工作。

sentences.english: Hymie said it'd save a lot of legal mess.
sentences.chinese: 海米說這樣可以省去許多法律上的麻煩。

sentences.english: But trust me it saves you from a lot of unnecessary hassle.
sentences.chinese: 但值得信賴的是這會讓你省去很多不必要的麻煩。

sentences.english: Paul decides to go through a realtor to save himself the trouble of running all over town looking.
sentences.chinese: 保羅決定通過房屋中介，省去到城裏到處亂找的麻煩。

sentences.english: Produce can take a big chunk out of your grocery budget.
sentences.chinese: 自產糧食可以省去你日常一大部分的開支。

sentences.english: Putting a meal in the slow cooker saves you from needing to heat up the kitchen later in the day.
sentences.chinese: 用文火慢慢燉着，可以省去在黃昏時分到廚房裏加熱。

sentences.english: Cisco even figured out a way to save on in-house tech-support staff.
sentences.chinese: 思科公司研究出一種能省去家庭技術支持人員的方法。

sentences.english: By being honest with your answers, you can avoid many unnecessary troubles.
sentences.chinese: 對以上問題回答自如，你能省去一些不必要的麻煩。

sentences.english: She could save him a lot of time and touble.
sentences.chinese: 她能讓他省去很多時間和麻煩。

definition: saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
many and complicated/mired in minor details
convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself
